courses.title: IGCSE Chemistry Mastery
courses.description: Master IGCSE Chemistry with clear explanations, past paper practice, and exam-focused techniques to help you succeed with confidence.

courses.title: O-Level Chemistry Complete Guide
courses.description: This comprehensive course covers all O-Level Chemistry concepts with structured lessons, practical examples, and mock assessments.

courses.title: A-Level Chemistry Deep Dive
courses.description: Deepen your understanding of A-Level Chemistry with our expertly designed lessons, advanced problem-solving, and exam strategies.

courses.title: Edexcel Chemistry Exam Prep
courses.description: Prepare for Edexcel Chemistry exams with targeted lessons, past paper walkthroughs, and topic-wise revision plans.

courses.title: OCR Chemistry Smart Revision
courses.description: Revise smartly for OCR Chemistry with condensed notes, visual aids, and tutor-led walkthroughs of key concepts and questions.

courses.title: FSc Chemistry Essentials
courses.description: Build a solid foundation in FSc Chemistry with clear concepts, board-focused topics, and past paper practice for Part 1 and Part 2.
